callout: BE THE FIRST TO WIELD THE POWER OF TRUCK.
middlesex:
So.. you think you like to make Jokes, but never before have you chogged like this. Your friends will be begging for their lives. There will be something funny that you said.

This deck will leave you sayin' "chiggadabup" and push popping jokes out the wah-zoo. I am, quite literally, broken, dude.
doublesex:
Your friends will be begging for their lives. There will be something funny that you said.

This deck will leave you sayin' "chiggadabup" and push popping jokes out the wah-zoo. I am, quite literally, broken, dude.
commandersex:
The sixth shard of Alera – smellflex – was discovered in the deep pit of Ridgefield, CT, and with it we have crafted the most powerful Magic, the Gathering commander ever to grace this Earth.

We used this power to build a commander reaching new dimensions of power: with six forms of Tweetums you can make any board state funny and deliver the win.

decksplay.jokes: Have You Ever Made A Joke?
